title: Google Sheets doubles cell limit for a single spreadsheet to 10 million
content:
Available now, Google Sheets has greatly expanded how much data you can fit on a single spread, with a whopping 10 million cell limit.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Sheets doubles cell limit for a single spreadsheet to 10 million appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has doubled the cell limit in its Google Sheets app to a whopping 10 million cells, but it's still well behind to Microsoft Excel.
